title: Women's Health
description: The Military Health System provides comprehensive women's health care, including reproductive health care and gender-specific care associated with cardiovascular health, mental health, and musculoskeletal injuries.
cleaned_text: On Oct. 20, 2022, the Secretary of Defense released a memorandum, "Ensuring Access to Reproductive Health Care," directing the Department take a series of actions to ensure Service members and their families can access non-covered reproductive health care.
